export default function Result({ tip, bill, people }) { const tipResult = function () { let tipr = (bill * tip) + bill / people return tipr } totalResult = function () { let totlr = bill / people * tip return totlr } return (

Tip Amount

/ person

{tipResult != 0 ? tipResult : 0}

Total

/ person

{totalResult != 0 ? tipResult : 0}

) }
